parameters.name: ascOrder
parameters.description: Specifies whether to sort the results in ascending order.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The statistics collection date. The date is accurate to the day. The date must be in the `YYYYMMdd` format.

parameters.name: orderColumn
parameters.description:
The column to sort by. Valid values:

- totalStorage

- longTermStorage

- lowFreqStorage

- standardStorage

- recycleBinStorage

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: projectPrefix
parameters.description: The prefix of the MaxCompute project name.

parameters.name: recentDays
parameters.description: The number of days for year-over-year comparison.

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: The tenant ID. You can log on to the MaxCompute console and choose **Tenant Property** in the navigation pane on the left to view the tenant ID.
